title: New: Felix Pallas – Curse
body:
Antwerp quartet **Felix Pallas** merge elements of Vampire Weekend-esque songwriting with the sort of slick production we’re used to from the likes of SOHN or Chet Faker.

In other words, it’s epic yet ssimultaneously grounded, perfect for singalongs and solitary heartbreak. Check out _Curse_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
